resources.string: The Design library introduces CoordinatorLayout, a layout which provides an additional level of control over touch events between child views, something which many of the components in the Design library take advantage of.Android CoordinatorLayout is a super-powered FrameLayout. It has a lot more to offer than it seems. It has additional level of control over it’s child views. It coordinates the animations and transitions of child views with one another. \nThe Design library introduces CoordinatorLayout, a layout which provides an additional level of control over touch events between child views, something which many of the components in the Design library take advantage of.Android CoordinatorLayout is a super-powered FrameLayout. It has a lot more to offer than it seems. It has additional level of control over it’s child views. It coordinates the animations and transitions of child views with one another.
